title: Basics of Youth Work and Leadership
headline: Learn the fundamentals of youth development and make a difference in society by enrolling in this free online course.
description: Developing your leadership abilities is an essential first step in realising your full professional potential if your goal is to become a social worker who supports the holistic development of children and adolescents. This course explores how to help those less fortunate than others by addressing inequality and mental health issues. It also demonstrates youth workers' role in assisting young people in maturing within the legal system.
courseDescription:
Experts claim the goal of youth work is to ‘encourage young people to grow holistically, facilitating their personal, social and scholastic development; to strengthen their voice, influence and role in society and to attain their full potential’. This course includes techniques to improve motivation, confidence and professionalism. Thousands of students worldwide would like this opportunity to complete this course so they can help others develop their sense of belonging and community.

To help young people, you need to have the necessary qualifications. Experience and knowledge will help you find the right tools to encourage youth to express themselves and give them a sense of worth. You can complete this youth work and leadership course anywhere, anytime. You only need an internet-connected laptop. The U.S. Federal government predicts a high need for youth workers over the next five years. Those who endeavour to follow this calling love working with youngsters and assisting others. 

Depending on your interests, this line of work can involve complex tasks like community work, outreach and school-based tasks like extra lessons. In addition, it often covers topics like inequality and mental health. Through these lectures, you will gain an awareness of the significance of trained youth workers in mental health services and legal frameworks, in addition to how to support juvenile development and the enormous influence social workers have on society. Start your training by discovering the foundations of youth work and gain the skills and understanding you need to start and understand the legal duties of this type of community work. Sign up for this free online course from anywhere and complete it at your own pace.
